name: Hebrew Font
author: Nilly Klein

sections.description:
Hebrew Font plugin allows you to select a Hebrew font from a variety of additional Hebrew fonts.

Using Hebrew fonts in your website is now easy!
Just choose the font you like from the Font-Family dropdown which exists in the visual editor.

Visit Plugin Page Hebrew Font Plugin Homepage for more information.

Hebrew Fonts added to dropdown list:

  • Alef
  • Noto Sans Hebrew
  • Miriam
  • Comix No 2
  • Nehama

Notes:

  • The Font-Family dropdown contains fonts for both: English and Hebrew. There are fonts which change only English letters.
  • Font ‘open sans hebrew condensed’ also added to the dropdown, but it is not displayed in IE using some of the themes.
sections.installation:
1. Download this plugin directly from your WordPress Admin Page.
  2. Click Install.
  3. Click Activate.
sections.changelog:

0.2

Tested with WordPress 4.2

0.3

Fix error message: Failed to load content css
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download this plugin directly from your WordPress Admin Page.
  2. Click Install.
  3. Click Activate.
